participant_1.background:
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
I fear that my writing will never be good enough.

participant_2.background:
My favorite place to eat is my local sushi bar because I love trying new things and their sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to take my iPhone to festivals and capture the best moments.
Oh that sounds like a lot of fun! I love to take pictures too.
Do you have any favorite places to take pictures?
I really like to take pictures of the city at night. The lights are so beautiful.
That sounds really cool! I've never thought of taking pictures of the city at night.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
I definitely will!
What else do you like to do in your free time?
I also like to go to my local sushi bar. The sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I've never been to a sushi bar before. I've always been too afraid to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's so good!
I might just have to do that!
You won't regret it!
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
I'm actually a writer myself. I write short stories and novels.
Oh that's really cool! I've always wanted to be a writer.
It's a lot of fun! But it can be really challenging too.
I'm sure it is! But I'm sure you're great at it!
Thanks! I'm still trying to figure out if I'm any good at it.
I'm sure you're great at it! You should keep writing!
Thanks! I will!
